infos.value: Lady Glaciela!?
Sister, be strong!
Is she injured...?
N-no... She looks largely unharmed...
I...I cannot go on.
Sister...
We let Minwu die, we lost Margritte, and now Viktora and Luartha are...
What have I done? I have accomplished nothing...
...Save for the misfortune I have let befall everyone...
You're wrong! You have done well for us!
As she says!
Sister, you gave us the hope we needed to keep living!
You're better off forgetting what that Serjes lapdog kept going on about.
You...you all would stay with me? Even after all this...?
Lady Glaciela, you were the one who freed us from Khury's tyranny!
You fight for the people, Lady Glaciela. We stand behind that!
Sister...are you okay?
We make for Bordisse Castle.
Bordisse Castle...?
An ancient castle on the southern outskirts of Wezette's territory.
It served as a defensive outpost many generations ago when we were at war with Leonis.
I heard it was abandoned after the alliance was formed. No need to protect the southern border after that.
My group has since made it their hideout. They are few in number, but some know how to wield a blade.
I see. So we rally there.
Damn. We've got company.
Let us make haste.
